column4: guys, i have a relative newb question.. the way i understand it, all of my application data is in /home/username.. so if i back up /home and do a clean reinstall of hardy, bring /home back and reinstall the apps, they should automatically link to that app data?

yes, you misundersatnd what happens with that app data when you say the word "link" the data doesn't link, what happens is when you run an application, it looks in that directory for data and reads that data and interprets it accordingly
i just wanted to double-check something (for obvious reasons)... by backing up /home i'd also back up all of my bookmarks, emails (t-bird) and evolution stuff?
